questions.question: ATLAS : MAPS :: DICTIONARY : ____
questions.explanation: An atlas holds maps; a dictionary holds words.

questions.question: STRATEGY : PLAN :: TACTIC : ____
questions.explanation: Strategy is a big plan; tactics are small actions.

questions.question: CALIBRATE : MEASURE :: REFUEL : ____
questions.explanation: To calibrate is to measure precisely; to refuel is to replenish fuel.

questions.question: PESSIMIST : DOUBT :: OPTIMIST : ____
questions.explanation: Pessimists doubt; optimists hope.

questions.question: FUSE : ELECTRICITY :: PIPE : ____
questions.explanation: A fuse carries electricity; a pipe carries water.

questions.question: MIGRATE : MOVE :: HIBERNATE : ____
questions.explanation: Migration is movement; hibernation is deep sleep.

questions.question: FORECAST : WEATHER :: DIAGNOSE : ____
questions.explanation: Forecasting predicts weather; diagnosing identifies illness.

questions.question: SYMBOL : REPRESENT :: TOOL : ____
questions.explanation: Symbols represent meaning; tools serve a function.

questions.question: MEDAL : HONOR :: TROPHY : ____
questions.explanation: A medal represents honor; a trophy represents victory.

questions.question: FILTER : REMOVE :: MAGNIFY : ____
questions.explanation: A filter removes impurities; magnify enlarges an image.

questions.question: CARGO : SHIP :: DATA : ____
questions.explanation: Cargo is carried by a ship; data is carried by a computer.

questions.question: ARTISAN : CRAFT :: SCIENTIST : ____
questions.explanation: Artisans create crafts; scientists conduct research.

questions.question: PRESCRIBE : MEDICINE :: ASSIGN : ____
questions.explanation: Doctors prescribe medicine; leaders assign tasks.

questions.question: REGULATE : CONTROL :: EVALUATE : ____
questions.explanation: Regulate means to control; evaluate means to assess.

questions.question: ABSORB : SPONGE :: AMPLIFY : ____
questions.explanation: A sponge absorbs; a speaker amplifies.

questions.question: ORIGIN : BEGINNING :: TERMINUS : ____
questions.explanation: Origin means beginning; terminus means end.

questions.question: EXTRACT : REMOVE :: INSERT : ____
questions.explanation: Extract means remove; insert means place inside.

questions.question: REINFORCE : STRENGTHEN :: REDUCE : ____
questions.explanation: Reinforce means strengthen; reduce means decrease.

questions.question: SCOUT : INFORMATION :: SENSOR : ____
questions.explanation: Scouts gather information; sensors gather data.

questions.question: PILOT : NAVIGATION :: SURGEON : ____
questions.explanation: Pilots require navigation; surgeons require precision.

questions.question: FREQUENCY : OFTEN :: DURATION : ____
questions.explanation: Frequency is how often; duration is how long (length of time).

questions.question: OVERRIDE : CONTROL :: COUNTERACT : ____
questions.explanation: Override means take control; counteract means oppose.

questions.question: COMMUNICATE : MESSAGE :: TRANSPORT : ____
questions.explanation: Communication carries messages; transport carries goods.

questions.question: MONITOR : OBSERVE :: DICTATE : ____
questions.explanation: Monitor means observe; dictate means command.

questions.question: SYNTHESIZE : COMBINE :: ANALYZE : ____
questions.explanation: To synthesize is to combine; to analyze is to examine.
